title: Can humans be cloned as well as genetically modified with current technology? - Quora

Human cloning hasn’t happened yet. There might be some technical problems but they could probably be overcome reasonably easily. We haven’t tried because nobody has yet come up with an ethically responsible reason for trying it. There is no sign of any change to that in the near future. Genetic engineering has been done on human embryos. The doctor who did it got a three year jail sentence.
